title: 35: Team Foxcatcher
itunes:title: Team Foxcatcher
description:
It's a sports docâ€¦but stick with us, you guys, it's also super murderey.

When billionaire John Du Pont decides to build the United States' premiere wrestling training facility on his property in Pennsylvania, he attracts the sport's top athletes and coaches to come live and train there. As the athletes and their families begin to create an idyllic 'sports utopia,' Du Pont devolves into a state of constant paranoia. As his mental state deteriorates and goes unchecked, Du Pont becomes suspicious and distrustful of the athletes who've come to depend on him--a combination that results in a brutal and senseless murder.

For even more TCO, find our weekly bonus mini episodes and our monthly Full Bonus Episodes on our Patreon page!
